title: Kitchen Confidential narrow sans
content:
![](files/Kitchen Confidential_3614.png)

Any Ideas? What the Font and Identifont didn’t yield much of anything that even looked similar.

Thanks for your help.
author: JeffM

comments.content: This looks like an odd customization of something like [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20070126142457/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.121025.0.20&attributes.sampleSize=74&sampleText=Kitchen&sampleSize=96) by someone not so experienced in type design. There are some awkward things going on here, especially in the ‘K’ and ‘a’.
I agree. It looks quite hacked & slashed & pasted. Something about that lc a thats interesting though…

My initial reaction was [_Industria_](http://web.archive.org/web/20070126142457/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=LH.108002.0.0) by **[Neville Brody](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Neville%20Brody)**. But alas nae. Although it does look like the bastard child of _Univers_ and _Industria_.
